text: Princess Mary () is a 1955 Soviet comedy movie directed by Isidor Annensky.Фильмы по произведениям Михаила Лермонтова вошли в программу фестиваля "Литература и кино"КНЯЖНА МЕРИ (1955) It stars Anatoliy Verbitskiy, K. Sanova, and Karina Shmarinova. == Actors == * Anatoliy Verbitskiy as Pechorin (as A. Verbitskiy) * K. Sanova as Princess Mary * Karina Shmarinova * Leonid Gubanov as Grushnitskiy (as L. Gubanov) * Mikhail Astangov as Verner (as M. Astangov) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1955 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies about princesses Category:Movies directed by Isidor Annensky
title: Princess Mary (movie)
